THE MYNYTE APP IS NOW OUT!


You can download it now on the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store.


 
Download MyNyte for Apple
 
  
 
Download MyNyte from Google Play
 

Hello Bedfordshire,

It's a big month for MyNyte! This month saw the official release of the much anticipated App, and the response so far has been great. Your business, along with other top picks across Bedford, can now be easily found and accessed via our innovative, user-friendly social media.

As you already know, MyNyte is Bedford's very own All-In-One Evening Planning App:

 Over 30 local food places
 Local events to discover
 Taxi booking
 Share offers with friends!

If you'd like to see how your business appears on the App, you can now download the full MyNyte App on the Apple App Store and Google Play today (see the buttons above).

The app has been released in time for Summer, the most sociable season of the year! If you have any events/offers coming up, we'd love to hear about them and can even feature them on the App to give you a little extra publicity.

On behalf of the MyNyte team, we thank you for your support of the App and look forward to promoting your business in the local area.

The MyNyte Team
